Special instructions concerning re-authoring of copied then adapted code

Simply put:

"I don't mind people copying then adapting this template project code, that is what it is for;
I do mind code introduced by other developers inadvertently appearing to be attributed to me."

(Dr Darren, Webel IT Australia)

  1. Please DO NOT adapt JSF test example pages under /web/examples/ directly !
    If you are going to adapt any of them please copy them into /web/test/
    first then re-author them using the free-style XML header comment.
  2. Please DO NOT adapt Java code under com.webel.test packages directly !
    If you are going to adapt any of the Java code please create new packages first
    for your organisation, copy Webel classes into them, then re-author them.
    • Create a new package indicating your organisation and copy them (preferrably renamed) into it.
    • Re-author the Javadoc @author tag in the class docs of copied classes from 'Darren Kelly (Webel IT Australia)' to yourself.
